archimate:Device.name: Pill Counter
archimate:Device.documentation:
Intended Use:
• Departments: Pharmacy, medication dispensing areas, inventory control. • Purpose: Automating pill counting to improve accuracy, reduce manual errors, enhance efficiency in prescription fulfillment, and streamline inventory management.
Specifications:
• Counting Speed: o Minimum 500–1,200 pills per minute (adjustable speed settings for different pill sizes and shapes). • Pill Compatibility: o Supports varied pill sizes, shapes, and coatings (tablets, capsules, gel caps, soft gels). o Adjustable settings for small, medium, and large pills. • Counting Accuracy: o 99.99% accuracy with double-checking sensor technology. o Optical, infrared, or weight-based counting mechanism. • Hopper Capacity: o Minimum 500–1,000 pills at a time. o Automatic feeding mechanism for continuous operation. • Output Options: o Manual dispensing into prescription bottles. o Automated sorting for bulk inventory management. • Display & Controls: o 7-inch or larger touchscreen interface with intuitive menu navigation. o Adjustable counting settings (batch counting, continuous mode, auto-stop). • Connectivity Options: o USB & Ethernet for integration with inventory management systems. o Wi-Fi for cloud-based tracking and remote monitoring. • Security & Compliance: o Tamper-proof locking mechanism for controlled access. o HIPAA and FDA-compliant for medication handling. • Noise Level: o ≤ 50 dB for quiet pharmacy environments. • Size & Form Factor: o Compact desktop-sized unit. o Approximate dimensions: 15–20 inches (width) x 10–15 inches (depth) x 10–18 inches (height). • Power Requirements: o 220–240V AC (compatible with St. Jude Hospital’s electrical system). • Maintenance & Durability: o Easy-to-clean, spill-resistant design. o Interchangeable counting plates and feed trays for different pill types.
